org.jasig.cas.support.saml.services.idp.metadata.cache

Class ChainingMetadataResolverCacheLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.common.cache.CacheLoader<SamlRegisteredService,org.opensaml.saml.metadata.resolver.ChainingMetadataResolver>
      • org.jasig.cas.support.saml.services.idp.metadata.cache.ChainingMetadataResolverCacheLoader

  • @Component(value="chainingMetadataResolverCacheLoader")
public class ChainingMetadataResolverCacheLoader
extends com.google.common.cache.CacheLoader<SamlRegisteredService,org.opensaml.saml.metadata.resolver.ChainingMetadataResolver>
    This is ChainingMetadataResolverCacheLoader that uses Guava's cache loading strategy to keep track of metadata resources and resolvers. The cache loader here supports loading metadata resources from SAML services, supports dynamic metadata queries and is able to run various validation filters on the metadata before finally caching the resolver.
    Since:
    4.3.0
